item.title: Building with Acrylic
item.description: I've been working on a telepresence robot on and off for some time. One thing I was held up on was getting the main structure built. I had done a design in Sketch-Up, but had no idea how to actually get it made for real. It turns out there are …
item.dc:creator: dkavanagh
